original_text: For indeed I was stolen away out of the land of the Hebrews: and here also have I done nothing that they should put me into the dungeon.
korean_text: 나는 히브리 땅에서 끌려온 자요 여기서도 옥에 갇힐 일은 행하지 아니하였나이다

sentences.original_text: For indeed I was stolen away
out of the land of the Hebrews:
and here also have I done nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이곳에서도 내가 아무것도 하지 않았는데

sentences.original_text: that they should put me into the dungeon.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 지하 감옥에 넣으려 한다.
